column2: "...Attached at the hip, I say. Doth thoust ne'er tire of each other's company?"
"Eep! S-Sukuna-hime? Sir Kotoshiro...?"
"Or mayhaps, art thou star-crossed lovers, hm?"
"L-l-lovers!? We're both girls!!"
"Male or female, love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind."
"...Glaze not, my dear. T'was only jest. How I enjoy making sport of Matoi, unlike Kotoshiro here."
"L-l-lovers!? N-no... that's...!"
"...blush not, my dear. T'was only jest. How I enjoy making sport of Matoi, unlike Kotoshiro here."
"His innocence is peerless. When asked, 'Wouldst thou lay down thy life on command?', the fool ran himself through with the sword!"
"If my orders were to call for my life, than so be it."
"Fool! Doth you know not what it means to jest?"
"Sukuna-hime's word is my law."
"Keh, no more brain then stone, this one. Learn to read betwixt the lines!"
"If that is your command."
"Even you are always with Sir Kotoshiro! It's not fair to make fun of us!"
"...I am the Maiden's Guardian. To serve by her side is my duty."
"Come now, Kotoshiro. 'Tis not what Matoi intended to express."
"She means to retort with an assault upon the nature of our relationship, hm?"
"1. You two seem like family."
"2. You two seem like a couple."
"Ho! Family? An apt expression! What sayest you, Kotoshiro?"
"Lovers, thou sayest? fufu... ahaha! What fanciful tales the mind weaves!"
"Family, I might concur. Lovers... well, what sayest you, Kotoshiro?"
"...I am indebted to Sukuna-hime. A debt so great, my entire life cannot repay."
"So in return, I swore to be her Guardian."
"Debt?"
"During a dispute with Kuronians, one Shironian village was razed to the ground. I am the sole survivor."
"I was but an infant, but by Sukuna-hime's grace, I was adopted and raised under her protection."
"She had every reason to cast me aside, being disabled. Yet she did not."
"Forsooth, I could have left you there, but I much prefer to sleep sound'ly."
"Though had I known what a stubborn mule was in my midst, I suppose I'd have chosen differently."
"I blame that on my upbringing."
"Well, well! Bold words coming from that incontinent rascal I remember. My, how they grow."
"T-that is completely irrelevant!!"
"...Ah, yes Matoi. Thou said \"even you,\" afore, yes?"
"Thusly, thou art admitting to a close relationship with <%me>, art thou not?"
"O-ooh! Would you stop teasing me already!!"
